data.description:
#  Welcome to Astro Chef, your ultimate high-speed cosmic culinary adventure!

Become the galaxy's top chef in Astro Chef's chaotic kitchen! Ready to cook up a cosmic storm and beat the clock? Serve dishes quickly to avoid angry alien customers!

**üåå Culinary Adventure:** Serve diverse dishes to alien customers with unique preferences while navigating intergalactic kitchen challenges. Unleash creativity with alien ingredients and unique tools.

**üë®‚Äçüç≥ Single Player & Co-op:** Restore your Uncle's restaurant alone or team up in party mode co-op. One player uses the VR headset while the other handles the Kitchen Manual. Teamwork and communication are key.

**üëΩ Extraterrestrial Cooking:** Discover perfect combinations to delight alien customers. Create stunning dishes with unique tools. Fast-paced gameplay keeps you on your toes, ensuring meals are on time and customers leave happy.

**üöÄ Kitchen Chaos:** Brace for chaos with space bugs, malfunctioning tools, and 'Out of Stock' challenges. Serve swarms of alien patrons quickly to maintain the galaxy‚Äôs top lunch spot.

**üèÜ Challenging Progression:** Advance through themed chapters with increasing dish complexity, testing your skills and adaptability. Each shift is randomized for a fresh experience. With each stellar rating, you're closer to becoming the ultimate Astro Chef.

**‚ú® Stunning Visuals:** Enjoy vibrant art, detailed environments, and charming alien customers. 

Ready to become the next Astro Chef? Join the cosmic kitchen chaos today!

changelog.change_log:
Changes: 
- Added seated play mode
- Overhauled the first time user experience! New chefs can now get into action faster and with clearer explanations.
- Improved Bug Spray & Solar Flare VFX
- Improved Lunch Rush bell SFX
- Improved the Customer Dish Review UI
- Increased the visual variety of processed ingredients. Create dishes that are even more out of this world than ever before.
- Fixed bugs and polished various items throughout the game

Welcome Astro Chefs! 
 We are over the moon with excitement at players finally getting their hands on the game. 
 While the game was making its way to you, we have already been working on various improvements to make the play experience even better! 
 In our first full patch for the game, you will find the following changes: 
 
 

Gastron has cleaned up the Dish Dressing area and installed a new Dish Dressing Item Dispenser! (where does he keep finding these machines?) This should make for a smoother and cleaner experience when dressing your dishes. 
 
  Spaceships (and debris) now appear behind the restaurant window. Word of the restaurant‚Äôs grand re-opening must have attracted some attention! 
 
 Updated a few of the dishes to resolve issues with ingredient requirements and/or improve the plating experience. 
 
 Added/improved various VFX. Including for the Nuclear Press, Jet Stove, respawning items & pouring liquids. 
 
 Improved Audio & various SFX throughout the game 
 
 Fixed various minor bugs & visual issues throughout the game. 
 
 Increased version number of the game to 1.0.3
